channel.title: Posts on Did you say data?
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Did you say data?

item.title: Linear regression: Modeling and Assumptions
item.description: Regression analysis is a powerful statistical process to find the relations within a dataset, with the key focus being on relationships between the independent variables (predictors) and a dependent variable (outcome). It can be used to build models for inference or prediction. Among several methods of regression analysis, linear regression sets the basis and is quite widely used for several real-world applications. In this post, we will look at building a linear regression model for inference.

Among several methods of regression analysis, linear regression sets the basis and is quite widely used for several real-world applications. In this post, we will look at building a linear regression model for inference.
